rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Spacious garage designed for two cars with ample storage space and easy maneuverability.

openings.location: Main Entrance from Garage to Ground Floor
openings.description: A wheelchair accessible door with easy swing mechanism and lowered height.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming space with ample natural light, designed for seamless flow to living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space oriented towards the north-east corner following Vastu for positive energy. Features large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with ample lighting. Designed with Vastu considerations for social interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen placed in the south-east zone, promoting good ventilation. Equipped with wheelchair-accessible counters and appliances.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spare bedroom in the west zone, ensuring privacy while receiving moderate natural light. Designed for wheelchair access.

openings.description: Large windows providing abundant natural light and cross ventilation.
Strategically placed for ventilation, following Vastu guidelines to promote air flow.
Wheelchair accessible door leading directly to the living room and dining area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom in the north-west zone for positive energy, featuring large windows that enhance natural light. Equipped with wheelchair accessible design elements.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom located in the west zone, designed for ample natural light and ventilation, with accessible features.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom in the south-west zone, ensuring privacy and balanced natural light. Designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom in the south-east zone, balancing light and ventilation with accessible design.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and provide privacy.
Well-placed window for ventilation and natural illumination.
Strategically positioned to enhance cross-ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
Additional window ensuring a balance of light and energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.

vastu_principles.description: Rooms placed in accordance with Vastu to promote health and prosperity.

local_building_norms.description: Design adheres to local building codes for industrial, triplex residential apartments.
All areas are designed following the Indian accessibility guidelines.
